questions.question: A media company wants to improve its content recommendation system by testing a new machine learning model.  Which scenario would benefit the most from using A/B testing for evaluating the new recommendation model?
options: The company wants to assess the impact of the new model on user engagement metrics, such as click-through rates and content consumption.
The company wants to ensure that the new model complies with data privacy regulations and does not expose any sensitive user information.
The company wants to evaluate the new model's performance on a static dataset of historical user interactions and content metadata.
The company wants to compare the computational performance of the new model against the existing model in terms of inference latency and resource utilization.
correct_answers: The company wants to assess the impact of the new model on user engagement metrics, such as click-through rates and content consumption.
questions.topic: 4.1 Monitor Model Performance and Data Quality
